name: Derek Lin
persona: Derek is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.71. He is motivated to improve his academic performance and sets moderate goals for himself, though he sometimes struggles with self-discipline and staying on top of assignments. Derek tends to handle test situations with a reasonable level of calm and demonstrates perseverance when faced with setbacks. He is aware of his strengths and areas for growth, and is actively working on building better study habits.
